Usage

How to use these templates

1

Download or Copy

Click the template link to download, or copy the code directly from the page.

2

Customize Placeholders

Replace all {{PLACEHOLDER}} values with your specific code:

  • {{OperationName}} - Your operation name (e.g., "Craft")
  • {{param1}} - First parameter
  • {{param2}} - Second parameter
  • {{resultFields}} - Result fields
3

Add to Your Project

Place the file in the appropriate location and wire it up per the guide.

See Add Server Features guide for complete instructions.

+ Add Item

InventoryService.AddItem(player, "itemId", 1, nil, true)
AddItem

Adds an item to the player's inventory. Follows hotbar-first, then storage logic.

Signature Luau 
function InventoryService.AddItem(
    player: Player,
    itemId: string,
    amount: number,
    metadata: any?,
    REPLICATE: boolean
): AddResult
Parameters Table
ParamTypeDescription
playerPlayerThe target player
itemIdstringItem ID (must exist in ServerStorage.Tools)
amountnumberQuantity to add
metadataany?Optional item metadata
REPLICATEbooleanSync to client if true
Returns Luau 
{
    success = boolean,
    reason = string?,
    addedItems = { { uuid, slotType, slot } }?,
    addedAmount = number,
    overflow = number
}

⇆ Swap Slots

InventoryService.SwapSlots(player, "Hotbar", 1, "Storage", 5, true)
SwapSlots

Swaps items between any two slots (Hotbar/Storage combinations).

Signature Luau 
function InventoryService.SwapSlots(
    player: Player,
    fromType: string,
    fromSlot: number,
    toType: string,
    toSlot: number,
    REPLICATE: boolean
): SwapResult
Parameters Table
ParamTypeDescription
fromTypestring"Hotbar" or "Storage"
fromSlotnumberSource slot index (1-based)
toTypestring"Hotbar" or "Storage"
toSlotnumberTarget slot index (1-based)
REPLICATEbooleanSync to client if true

🔍 Get State

InventoryService.GetState(player)
GetState

Returns the player's inventory state for direct access.

Signature Luau 
function InventoryService.GetState(player: Player): InventoryStateType?
Returns Luau 
InventoryStateType {
    Items: { [uuid] = ItemInstance },
    ItemsByID: { [itemId] = { uuid } },
    Hotbar: { [slot] = uuid? },
    Storage: { uuid },
    EquippedItemUUID: string?,
    Weight: number,
    Settings: PlayerSettings
}
